Hero.heading1: We systemize and automate your businesses efficiently,
Hero.heading2: custom-built and fully managed for you.
Hero.subtext: We audit your business, organize your operations and implement AI automations to reduce manual work and help your work effectively.

ApproachIntro.description: We follow a structured four-phase methodology that starts with a deep business audit and ends with fully automated, measurable systems that run without you having to micromanage every process.

Phases.phase01Desc: We start by deeply analyzing your current operations, identifying bottlenecks, redundant processes, and untapped opportunities. You get a clear roadmap of what to fix and in what order.
Phases.phase02Desc: We design and implement the core operational systems your business needs: project management, CRMs, reporting dashboards, and communication frameworks that give you full visibility and control.
Phases.phase03Desc: We layer intelligent automations on top of your systems using tools like n8n and custom AI models. Repetitive tasks are eliminated. Your team focuses on high-value work.
Phases.phase04Desc: We don't just build and leave. We train your team, document every process with clear SOPs, and set up metrics so you can track performance and continue improving after we're done.

CaseStudies.heading: Client work and results
CaseStudies.case1Headline: Hours of Reporting Reduced to Minutes with Custom API Workflows
CaseStudies.case1Did1: Designed custom APIs and automated workflows to replace manual Excel-based reporting
CaseStudies.case1Did2: Eliminated repetitive chart creation, distribution, and review cycles
CaseStudies.case1Did3: Freed up staff time to focus on higher-value strategic tasks
CaseStudies.case1Quote: Our teams were spending hours every day creating, sending, and reviewing Excel charts for internal logistics. Anhmake built custom APIs and workflows that eliminated all of that — now our people focus on work that actually moves the needle.
CaseStudies.case2Headline: Real-Time Production Visibility, Zero Manual Reporting
CaseStudies.case2Did1: Automated capture of frequently changing production floor data into a central database
CaseStudies.case2Did2: Eliminated manual data collection, consolidation, and report generation
CaseStudies.case2Did3: Built real-time dashboards for instant production status visibility
CaseStudies.case2Quote: Our staff used to spend countless hours manually updating, compiling, and formatting production data into reports. Now everything flows into the database automatically and the entire team can see results on a live dashboard. Productivity has never been higher.
CaseStudies.case3Headline: From Hours of Manual Work to Minutes with Custom Scripts
CaseStudies.case3Did1: Analyzed existing design tool workflows for pamphlet and namecard production
CaseStudies.case3Did2: Built custom scripts tailored to their current software environment
CaseStudies.case3Did3: Reduced repetitive layout and formatting tasks from hours to minutes
CaseStudies.case3Quote: Creating ad pamphlets and namecards used to take us hours of tedious manual work. Anhmake designed scripts that plug right into the tools we already use — what took hours now takes just a few minutes. It's been a game-changer for our team.

Technology.heading: Technology we specialize in
Technology.subtext: We're tool-agnostic. We pick the right technology for your specific business context.

WhyUs.point1Body: We take the time to understand your business at a deep level before recommending any technology. We diagnose before we prescribe — which means you get solutions that actually fit.
WhyUs.point2Title: Knowing tools isn't the hard part. Understanding how a business actually runs — that is
WhyUs.point2Body: We build automation solutions on top of your existing tech stack. No unnecessary replacements, no over-engineering. Just practical implementations that get results without adding complexity or cost.
WhyUs.point3Title: We don't just use AI. We build it
WhyUs.point3Body: While most automation agencies stop at prompt engineering and off-the-shelf AI tools, we have hands-on experience building custom AI systems — designed around your specific workflows, data, and business logic.
WhyUs.point4Title: Tech agnostic — we pick what's right for you
WhyUs.point4Body: We have no vendor quotas or preferred tools to push. We evaluate your specific needs and select the best technology for your situation, not the one that pays us the highest referral fee.

Outcomes.heading1: We find constraints, then solve them for

FinalCTA.subtitle: Reach Operational Excellence
FinalCTA.heading: You're a few systems away from doubling your profit margins.

Footer.tagline: We audit your business and implement AI automations to reduce manual work and scale efficiently.
